title: (x) Modern serif and gothic sans - Filosofia, Benton Sans {Brandon S}

author: 18karis

comments.content: Need an image mate. Lex mentioned on your other post that it may be a CMYK/RGB issue.

Must be a browser thing, since I can see them.

Nos. 1, 2: [Filosofia](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706224344/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=filosofia)  
Nos. 3, 4: [Benton Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706224344/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=benton+sans)
